p: The observational evaluation did not record behavioural changes for all treated groups (diarrhea, immobility, excitement, refusal of food, tremor, and mortality) during the test period. The animals treated with 2000 mg/kg acquired a relaxation that occurred in the first 40 min after treatment compared to the control group. This result was consistent with the previous literature that showed the Genus Withania possessed calming substances [ 22].
